overview: Saeed El-Darahali has more than five years of management experience in the IT industry, with an interest in strategic partnering, corporate financing, strategic growth, operations, and sales and marketing management. Since 2004, Saeed has been working as a venture analyst and adviser with InNOVAcorp, an organization enabling high growth early stage Nova Scotia companies to accelerate commercialization of their technologies and increase competitiveness in export markets. In this role, Saeed is responsible for assessing investment opportunities, conducting extensive due diligence, and business planning.
